agenda.description: SENATE NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Nominations TIME & DATE: 9:00 AM Thursday, February 21, 2019 PLACE: E1.016 (Hearing Room) CHAIR: Senator Dawn Buckingham __________________________________________________________________________________ To consider the following: Pending business from the 2/14/19 meeting as well as the posted agenda. The following nominees will appear: Division of Workers' Compensation, Texas Department of Insurance Cassandra Jeanette Brown Appointed 02-06-19 for a Zaffirini Travis County term to expire 02-01-21 Office of Public Insurance Counsel Melissa Ruth Hamilton Appointed 02-06-19 for a Watson Travis County term to expire 02-01-21 Office of Independent Ombudsman for the Texas Juvenile Justice Department Jeffery Don Robertson Appointed 02-07-19 for a Campbell Hays County term to expire 02-01-21 Office of Inspector General, Health and Human Services Commission Sylvia Hernandez Kauffman Appointed 02-06-19 for a Campbell Travis County term to expire 02-01-20 Criminal District Attorney, Wood County Angela Lea Albers Appointed 02-08-19 for a Hughes Wood County term to expire 12-31-20 Texas State Technical College System Board of Regents John Kent Hatchel Appointed 02-15-18 for a Birdwell McLennan County term to expire 08-31-23 Governing Board of the Texas Civil Commitment Office Jose Luis Aliseda Appointed 02-08-19 for a Zaffirini Bee County term to expire 02-01-25 School Land Board Scott Rohrman--AG Appointed 09-01-17 for a Johnson Appointee term to expire 08-31-19 Dallas County The following nominees will not appear: Advisory Committee to the Texas Board of Criminal Justice on Offenders with Medical or Mental Impairments Allan Douglas Cain Appointed 01-07-19 for a Hughes Panola County term to expire 02-01-23 Robert John Chody Appointed 01-07-19 for a Schwertner Williamson County term to expire 02-01-23 Alamo Regional Mobility Authority Michael J.
